message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great value at $110. It's a steal at this price, and I think you'll really love it!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $100, which is a great compromise considering the product's value. It's a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle again.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $98, which is as low as I'm comfortable going. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price. Let me know if you're interested!
